short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a Content Creators popup to the Gaijin Store page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pick and choose a Gaijin partner to support from War Thunder.

Key Features:

One-click support: See a cool decal? Click it to instantly be redirected to a page that shows you the decal in bigger form, and you can even save that page in your bookmarks. This also serves as a safety net. if you didn't mean to click a creator you can cancel/go back a page with out triggering the website to be locked to that creator for an hour. So acts as a double check/are you sure type of thing.

Bookmark your favorites: Never miss out on supporting your go-to creators again! Bookmark them directly after clicking their decal. Each creator has their own URL readily available within the extension. Click a decal and just bookmark the page like normal.

Discover new creators: Explore the list of creators and find new faces to support and maybe grab their decal tool.

Get reminded: The extension even reminds you to support creators when you're at checkout. Just incase you forget.

Stay up-to-date: The extension is open-source on GitHub, with constant updates and new creator additions.

This extension isn't just for supporting your favorite content creators - it's also a great way to:

Discover new in-game packs and items: The extension shows you the latest hidden store offers, 3D decor, and even registration bonus items you might have missed or well hidden.
